sexAction.title: Eat doughnuts
sexAction.tooltip: #IF(npc2==natalya) Do as Mistress Natalya commands and eat her iced doughnut, before moving over to Callie. #ELSE Begin by eating Callie's iced doughnut, before moving over to Mistress Natalya. #ENDIF

description.text:
